presentation2: My name is Gabriel, I am {{age}} years old, and I live in Dijon, the city of mustard (and Kir)!
presentation3: After getting my BTEC National Diploma, I pursued into the BTEC Higher National Diploma, then went into a Master's Degree in engineering, while doing a double cursus with a Master's Degree in Imagery (2D and 3D) and AI.
presentation4: Having done multiple internships in various companies (Including database management, improving a company's ERP, and video game development), and also done some similar work while self-employed, I am now looking for a full-time job!
presentation5: I am a french native, but can also speak good conversational english. I scored 985 during the TOEIC.
presentation6: Other than programming, I am particularly fond of traveling (to meet internet friends in particular). I have also recently taken a liking to artistic things like drawing and music, I plan on getting an instrument fairly soon :)
